observation: I can see the Specter.AI homepage with a 'Sign Up' button in the header. There are also form fields for email and password visible at the bottom of the page, along with 'Create Account' and 'Get Started' buttons. I need to start the sign-up process by clicking the Sign Up button in the header.
reasoning: As a normal user wanting to sign up, I should click the most prominent 'Sign Up' button in the header to begin the registration process.

outcome.visual_observation: The Sign Up button disappeared from the header and was replaced with a red circular element with white text/icon inside. No sign-up flow interface appeared - no modal, form, or new page content is visible.
outcome.diagnosis: The Sign Up button tap appears to have triggered an unexpected state change rather than initiating the sign-up flow. The button transformed into a different UI element instead of opening a registration form or navigating to a sign-up page.

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The Sign Up button disappeared from the header and was replaced with a red circular element with white text/icon inside. No sign-up flow interface appeared - no modal, form, or new page content is visible.
dual_diagnosis.diagnosis: The Sign Up button tap appears to have triggered an unexpected state change rather than initiating the sign-up flow. The button transformed into a different UI element instead of opening a registration form or navigating to a sign-up page.
